articles.title: Happy Birthday Kim Taehyung: A look back at his ‘starry’ 2023 - India Today
articles.description: BTS member Kim Taehyung, also known as V, celebrates his 28th birthday today. The year has been eventful for him, with the release of his first solo album 'Layover' smashing records and his active presence on social media.
articles.content: Kim Taehyung, the second-youngest member of BTS, is quite a popular star across. The BTS singer is known for his deep voice and stunning dance visuals. When not on stage, V is busy entertaining fans … [+3544 chars]
